subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=50|rad=巾|as=08|sn=11|four=|canj=LBIKH|ids=⿰巾参}}

# (simplified form of [[幓]]) (same as [[縿]]) the [[long]] [[band]]s or [[ribbon]]s [[attach]]ed to [[flag]]s and [[banner]]s, [[streamer]]
# (same as [[襂]]) [[feather]]-[[decorate]]d [[carriage]]s or [[dress]]es
# [[flap]]ping and [[dangling]]
# [[headdress]] [[worn]] by [[men]] in [[ancient]] [[time]]s
